metadata.description: Foundation Words Part 9 - Enhanced with Engagement Features
metadata.pedagogical_focus: Ocean/nature words and action words with -ing endings
metadata.theme_coverage: Ocean, nature, animals, technology, action themes
metadata.builds_on: Chunks 1-8 foundation patterns, adding present tense actions and ocean vocabulary

words.meaning_support: The hard, protective outer covering that sea creatures make
words.context_introduction: The beautiful, hard home that sea creatures make to keep themselves safe. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya found a perfect spiral SHELL washed up on the sandy shore!
words.personal_connection_question: Have you ever found shells at the beach or heard the ocean sound in one?
words.story_connection: Magic SHELL treasures often hold messages from ocean creatures!
words.celebration_message: Great job! SHELL has 'sh' digraph and double 'l' working together!

words.meaning_support: To give off bright, beautiful light that sparkles
words.context_introduction: When something gives off bright, sparkling light that makes everything beautiful. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The morning sun made the dewdrops SHINE like tiny diamonds on the grass!
words.personal_connection_question: What things do you see shine that make you feel happy?
words.story_connection: Magical objects SHINE to guide heroes on their quests!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! SHINE has 'sh' digraph and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: To send something moving fast through the air or space
words.context_introduction: To send something moving really fast through the air, like a rocket or arrow. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya watched the shooting star SHOOT across the dark night sky!
words.personal_connection_question: Have you ever seen a shooting star or rocket shoot across the sky?
words.story_connection: Space explorers SHOOT their rockets toward distant planets!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! SHOOT has 'sh' digraph and 'oo' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: The land right next to the ocean, lake, or river
words.context_introduction: The special place where land meets water - perfect for exploring and discovery. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam and Maya spent hours exploring the rocky SHORE looking for tide pool creatures!
words.personal_connection_question: What would you most like to find while exploring a shore?
words.story_connection: Characters often discover treasures washed up on the SHORE!
words.celebration_message: Great! SHORE has 'sh' digraph and 'ore' controlled by 'r'!

words.meaning_support: To speak very loudly so everyone can hear you
words.context_introduction: To speak really loudly so everyone can hear your important message. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya had to SHOUT with joy when she spotted the family of dolphins!
words.personal_connection_question: When do you like to shout - when you're excited or calling friends?
words.story_connection: Characters SHOUT warnings to help their friends stay safe!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! SHOUT has 'sh' digraph and 'ou' diphthong!

words.meaning_support: To show appreciation for something kind someone did
words.context_introduction: When you want to show someone you appreciate their kindness and help. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya wanted to THANK Sam for helping her rescue the injured bird!
words.personal_connection_question: Who would you like to thank for something they did for you?
words.story_connection: Characters always THANK those who help them on adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! THANK has 'th' digraph and 'nk' blend!

words.meaning_support: Pointing to several things that are close to you right now
words.context_introduction: A word for pointing to several things that are near you right now. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya said 'THESE beautiful flowers are perfect for our nature collection!'
words.personal_connection_question: What are some of these things around you right now that you like?
words.story_connection: Characters say THESE when they discover treasures nearby!
words.celebration_message: Great job! THESE has 'th' digraph and 'ese' pattern!

words.meaning_support: Pointing to several things that are far away from you
words.context_introduction: A word for pointing to several things that are far away from you. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam pointed and said 'THOSE mountains in the distance look perfect for exploring!'
words.personal_connection_question: What are some of those things far away that you'd like to explore?
words.story_connection: Characters point to THOSE distant places they want to visit!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! THOSE has 'th' digraph and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: A huge, magnificent animal that lives in the ocean and sings
words.context_introduction: The biggest, most magnificent animal in the ocean that sings beautiful songs. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya gasped with wonder when the enormous WHALE surfaced right next to their boat!
words.personal_connection_question: What would you want to say to a whale if you could talk to one?
words.story_connection: Wise WHALE characters often guide ocean adventurers to safety!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! WHALE has 'wh' digraph and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: A round object that turns to help vehicles and machines move
words.context_introduction: A perfectly round object that spins to help cars, bikes, and machines move smoothly. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam's bike WHEEL spun smoothly as he rode down the forest trail!
words.visual_context: üé° Round object that turns for movement
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite thing with wheels - bikes, cars, or skateboards?
words.story_connection: Adventure vehicles need strong WHEEL parts for long journeys!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! WHEEL has 'wh' digraph and 'ee' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: A device that lets you talk to people far away
words.context_introduction: A amazing device that lets you hear the voice of someone far away. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya called Sam on the PHONE to share her exciting discovery about the bird nest!
words.visual_context: üìû Device for talking to distant people
words.personal_connection_question: Who do you most like to talk to on the phone?
words.story_connection: Characters use PHONE calls to get help during emergencies!
words.celebration_message: Great! PHONE has 'ph' digraph (making 'f' sound) and magic 'e'!

words.meaning_support: A picture captured with a camera to remember special moments
words.context_introduction: A picture captured with a camera that saves special memories forever. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya took a perfect PHOTO of the rainbow appearing after the storm!
words.personal_connection_question: What would you most like to take a photo of?
words.story_connection: Characters take PHOTO evidence of their amazing adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! PHOTO has 'ph' digraph and two syllables: 'pho-to'!

words.meaning_support: Moving to another place right now
words.context_introduction: When you're moving toward a place or destination right at this moment. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya was GOING to the secret meadow where the wildflowers bloomed!
words.personal_connection_question: Where are you going next that you're excited about?
words.story_connection: Characters are always GOING on new adventures!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! GOING has the -ING ending that shows action happening now!

words.meaning_support: Working on or performing an activity right now
words.context_introduction: When you're working on or performing some activity at this very moment. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam was DOING his best to help the injured butterfly heal its wing!
words.personal_connection_question: What activity are you doing right now that you enjoy?
words.story_connection: Heroes are always DOING good deeds to help others!
words.celebration_message: Great job! DOING adds -ING to show the action is happening right now!

words.meaning_support: Having fun with games, toys, or friends right now
words.context_introduction: When you're having fun with games, friends, or activities at this moment. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya and Sam were PLAYING their favorite hiding game among the tall oak trees!
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite thing to be playing with friends?
words.story_connection: Characters bond by PLAYING games during their adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! PLAYING has 'pl' blend, 'ay' vowel team, and -ING ending!

words.meaning_support: Moving very fast with your legs right now
words.context_introduction: When you're moving really fast with your legs pumping hard right at this moment. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya was RUNNING as fast as she could to catch up with the playful fox!
words.visual_context: üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Moving very fast with legs now
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like running fast or prefer jogging slowly?
words.story_connection: Characters are often RUNNING toward exciting discoveries!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! RUNNING doubles the 'n' before adding -ING!

words.meaning_support: Pushing off the ground with your feet to fly through air right now
words.context_introduction: When you're pushing off the ground with your legs to fly through the air. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam was JUMPING from rock to rock across the bubbling creek!
words.visual_context: ü¶ò Pushing off ground to fly now
words.personal_connection_question: What's the most fun thing to be jumping on or over?
words.story_connection: Characters are often JUMPING over obstacles during quests!
words.celebration_message: Great! JUMPING has 'mp' blend and -ING ending for current action!

words.meaning_support: Moving by putting one foot in front of the other right now
words.context_introduction: When you're moving step by step, exploring the world around you. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya was WALKING quietly through the forest, listening to all the bird sounds!
words.personal_connection_question: Where do you like walking to explore and discover things?
words.story_connection: Characters are often WALKING into new adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! WALKING has silent 'l' and -ING ending!

words.meaning_support: Speaking words out loud to share thoughts right now
words.context_introduction: When you're sharing your thoughts and ideas with others using your voice. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya and Sam were TALKING excitedly about their plans for the treasure hunt!
words.visual_context: üí¨ Speaking words to share thoughts now
words.personal_connection_question: What do you enjoy talking about most with your friends?
words.story_connection: Characters are often TALKING about their exciting discoveries!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! TALKING has silent 'l' and -ING ending for ongoing action!

words.meaning_support: Using your eyes to see and observe things right now
words.context_introduction: When you're using your eyes to see and notice interesting things around you. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam was LOOKING carefully for animal tracks in the soft mud by the pond!
words.visual_context: üëÄ Using eyes to see things now
words.personal_connection_question: What are you looking for when you explore outside?
words.story_connection: Detective characters are always LOOKING for important clues!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! LOOKING has 'ook' vowel team and -ING ending!
